english.segment1: Holy Spirit, Touch Your people. Teach us the ways of God. And as we live, As Jesus did. You are honored and lifted up
english.segment2: There's a stirring in the Spirit. There's an urgency in this hour. We as children must obey. Can you hear. The footsteps of God
english.segment3: God is moving, God is moving
english.segment4: Can you hear the sound. Of revival
english.segment5: As we praise You, as we sing. Draw near to us O God
english.segment6: As we cry out for the nations. Pour out revival in the land
english.segment7: There's a stirring in the Spirit. There's an urgency in this hour. We as children must obey. Can you hear. The footsteps of God
